name: How will COVID-19 affect my appointment?
description: Weâ€™ve added new precautions to minimize the risk of COVID-19 transmission. You can focus on getting the answers you seek, knowing that we're committed to keeping you safe.

name: Am I covered?
description: Mayo Clinic providers and hospitals have established contracts with a long list of insurance plans. About 50 percent of the adult U.S. population is covered. Check now to see if you're one of them.

name: How much will care cost?
description: When you have health challenges, calculating costs can be overwhelming. As a non-profit academic medical center, Mayo Clinic is committed to transparency about fees and services. Check our cost estimator for prices and payments at our facilities.

name: Do I need a referral
description: Mayo Clinic generally doesn't require a doctor's referral. But your insurance might. It's a good idea to check with your insurance company. If you need a referral, we can help you through this process.
